pli-tv-bi-vb-pc57:2.1: The nuns’ rules and their analysis
pli-tv-bi-vb-pc57:3.1: The chapter on offenses entailing confession
pli-tv-bi-vb-pc57:5.1: 57. The training rule on not inviting
pli-tv-bi-vb-pc57:6.1: At one time the Buddha was staying at Sāvatthī in the Jeta Grove, Anāthapiṇḍika’s Monastery.
pli-tv-bi-vb-pc57:6.2: At that time a number of nuns who had spent the rainy-season residence in a village monastery went to Sāvatthī.
pli-tv-bi-vb-pc57:6.4: “Venerables, where did you spend the rainy-season residence?
pli-tv-bi-vb-pc57:6.5: Where did you invite the Order of monks for correction?”
pli-tv-bi-vb-pc57:6.6: “We don’t invite the Order of monks for correction.”
pli-tv-bi-vb-pc57:7.1: The nuns of few desires complained and criticized them,
pli-tv-bi-vb-pc57:7.2: “How can nuns who have completed the rainy-season residence not invite the Order of monks for correction?” …
pli-tv-bi-vb-pc57:7.3: “Is it true, monks, that nuns did this?”
pli-tv-bi-vb-pc57:7.6: How can nuns who have completed the rainy-season residence not invite the Order of monks for correction?
pli-tv-bi-vb-pc57:7.7: This will not give rise to confidence in those without it …
pli-tv-bi-vb-pc57:7.8: And, monks, the nuns should recite this training rule thus:
pli-tv-bi-vb-pc57:8.1: ‘If a nun who has completed the rainy-season residence does not invite correction from both Orders in regard to three things—what has been seen and what has been heard and what has been suspected—she commits an offense entailing confession.’”
pli-tv-bi-vb-pc57:9.4: … The nun who has been given the full ordination by both complete Orders through a legal procedure consisting of one motion and three announcements that is irreversible and fit to stand—this sort of nun is meant in this case.
pli-tv-bi-vb-pc57:10.1: Who has completed the rainy-season residence:
pli-tv-bi-vb-pc57:10.2: she has completed the first three months or the last three months.
pli-tv-bi-vb-pc57:10.3: If she thinks, “I will not invite correction from both Orders in regard to three things—what has been seen or heard or suspected,” then by the mere fact of giving up her duty, she commits an offense entailing confession.
pli-tv-bi-vb-pc57:11.3: if she searches, but does not find anyone to invite;
pli-tv-bi-vb-pc57:11.7: if she is the first offender.
pli-tv-bi-vb-pc57:12.1: The seventh training rule is finished.
